A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No one hates Star Wars more than Star Wars fans\, which is evident with the viewer reviews\, but as a die hard fan from the first time seeing Star Wars in the ‘80’s as a kid I can honestly say this movie was brilliant in its execution of giving you a fully unexpected experience. Fan’s biggest complaints after The Force Awakens was that it was too similar to A New Hope and now their biggest complaint with this one is that it didn’t spoon feed them everything that they wanted or expected. After letting go of expectations after the first couple of reveals didn’t go the way I thought they would go I thoroughly enjoyed almost every aspect of this entry in the Star Wars saga.
